scripts.build: npm run build-src --silent && npm run build-tests --silent
scripts.test-lint: npm run test-lint-src --silent && npm run test-lint-tests --silent
scripts.test-unit: istanbul --include-all-sources cover --dir ./test-result/unit/coverage node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot test/unit/**/**/*.test.js test/unit/**/**/**/*.test.js
scripts.test-unit-ci: istanbul --include-all-sources cover --dir ./test-result/unit/coverage node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter mocha-junit-reporter --reporter-options mochaFile=./test-result/unit/unit-tests.xml test/unit/**/**/*.test.js test/unit/**/**/**/*.test.js
scripts.pretest: npm run build --silent && npm run test-lint --silent
scripts.test: npm run test-unit --silent && npm run test-integration --silent
scripts.pretest-ci: npm run build --silent && npm run test-lint --silent
scripts.test-ci: npm run test-unit-ci --silent && npm run test-integration --silent
